title: Wasn't given the bonus rp when activated my card during the bonus rp period (12/1-18/1)
body: i activated my $25 rp card and didnt get my bonus rp? help?

replies.body:
Hi there,

The Bonus RP wasn't supposed to kick until later in the day. Sorry about the unclear messaging. Anyone who already purchased RP or redeemed a prepaid card between 00:00 AM and 12:30 PM on Jan 12th we will be receiving the bonus RP to their account within 24-48 hrs.

We've since updated the [news post](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-coming-limited-time-0).
